abstract: Under the deal, the British oil company would cede a potentially lucrative Arctic exploration deal to its Russian joint-venture partner TNK-BP.
snippet: Under the deal, the British oil company would cede a potentially lucrative Arctic exploration deal to its Russian joint-venture partner TNK-BP.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The oil giant BP made a crucial concession on Friday in an attempt to salvage a share-swap agreement with Rosneft, the Russian state-controlled oil company.

headline.main: BP Offers Plan to Salvage Its Swap Deal With Rosneft
headline.print_headline: BP Offers Plan to Salvage Its Swap Deal With Rosneft
